wikipedia_page.main: Herbert Septimus Uber (1885-1969), was a male badminton player from England.

response: | align=center|1920 ||  A. Fee (Archibald Engelbach)   Raoul du Roveray ||  J. H. C. Prior   Herbert Uber || 15–13, 15–8

| align=center|1928 ||  Frank Hodge   George Alan Thomas ||  Arthur Kenneth Jones   Herbert Uber || 15–9, 4–15, 15–9
